Package org.openlca.julia

Class Julia

java.lang.Object
org.openlca.julia.Julia
public final class Julia extends Object
Provides the Java interface for the native Julia libraries and contains some utility methods for loading these libraries.

  • Method Details

    • isLoaded

      public static boolean isLoaded()
      Returns true if the Julia libraries with openLCA bindings are loaded.

    • hasSparseLibraries

      public static boolean hasSparseLibraries()

    • fetchSparseLibraries

      public static boolean fetchSparseLibraries()

    • getDefaultDir

      public static File getDefaultDir()
      Get the default location on the file system where our native libraries are located.

    • load

      public static boolean load()
      Tries to load the libraries from the default folder. Returns true if the libraries could be loaded or if they were already loaded.

    • loadFromDir

      public static boolean loadFromDir​(File dir)
      Loads the Julia libraries and openLCA bindings from the given folder. Returns true if the libraries could be loaded (at least there should be a `libjolca` library in the folder that could be loaded).

    • mmult

      public static void mmult​(int rowsA, int colsB, int k, double[] a, double[] b, double[] c)
      Matrix-matrix multiplication: C := A * B
      Parameters:
      rowsA - [in] number of rows of matrix A
      colsB - [in] number of columns of matrix B
      k - [in] number of columns of matrix A and number of rows of matrix B
      a - [in] matrix A (size = rowsA*k)
      b - [in] matrix B (size = k * colsB)
      c - [out] matrix C (size = rowsA * colsB)

    • mvmult

      public static void mvmult​(int rowsA, int colsA, double[] a, double[] x, double[] y)
      Matrix-vector multiplication: y:= A * x
      Parameters:
      rowsA - [in] rows of matrix A
      colsA - [in] columns of matrix A
      a - [in] the matrix A
      x - [in] the vector x
      y - [out] the resulting vector y

    • solve

      public static int solve​(int n, int nrhs, double[] a, double[] b)
      Solves a system of linear equations A * X = B for general matrices. It calls the LAPACK DGESV routine.
      Parameters:
      n - [in] the dimension of the matrix A (n = rows = columns of A)
      nrhs - [in] the number of columns of the matrix B
      a - [io] on entry the matrix A, on exit the LU factorization of A (size = n * n)
      b - [io] on entry the matrix B, on exit the solution of the equation (size = n * bColums)
      Returns:
      the LAPACK return code

    • invert

      public static int invert​(int n, double[] a)
      Inverts the given matrix.
      Parameters:
      n - [in] the dimension of the matrix (n = rows = columns)
      a - [io] on entry: the matrix to be inverted, on exit: the inverse (size = n * n)
      Returns:
      the LAPACK return code

      public static void umfSolve​(int n, int[] columnPointers, int[] rowIndices, double[] values, double[] demand, double[] result)
